content.detailedDescription: We were driving home in rome pa and i thought i saw 2 stars until i realized how bright they were and close together. i noticed it was moving and kinda low. it went over top of us and i looked under it. i could see a circle that was a lighter shade of black than the sky. it had two really dim red lights under it. i was very surpfised when i saw this and it was like it was trying not to be seen. we lost sight of it as it flew over us
content.summary: 2 star-like bright lights with circular shape under it and 2 dim red lights.

content.detailedDescription: I taking my dog out before bed and i was looking down and then i noticed a moving light above me (and by above me i don���t mean right above me.... it was really high up there) and as soon as i lifted my head the light (which looked like a "shooting star" at first) went screaming across the sky, then instead of following a natural curve falling toward the ground it tailed upwards and then was gone. more than likely it was still a "shooting star" but if anyone else saw something that night maybe it would help. and the only reason i���m reporting it is because i was stunned by the movement of it. it did not seem normal.
content.summary: Shooting star that tailed upwards.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east on i-10 near mile marker 43 when i saw a large green light flash by me on the right side. it was running parallel to the interstate heading east at a slight downward angle approximately 300 yards from the highway. i was driving 65 mph and it passed me like i was sitting still, probably traveling close to 200 mph. i watched it for several seconds before i lost sight of it behind some trees. my first thought was that it might be a meteor but i've never seen a meteor that looked like that. it was very large, very close to me and had no tail behind it. the intensity and color of the light remained the same the entire time. it was about the same color as a green traffic light. after traveling a few more miles i noticed a small airport in the direction the light was headed but i did not see any planes on the runway, and i do not think it was a plane because i did not see any of the other lights that an airplane would normally have on it. it was also only a couple hundred feet off of the ground and very close to some houses when i first noticed it. it probably was just a meteor or some other natural phenomenon but i thought i would report it anyway. what is really odd about this incident is the fact that i just joined mufon a week ago and this is the first ufo i've ever seen. i thought that was kind of weird.
content.summary: Large green light flying through night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I returned home from shopping and let our three dogs outside at approximately 645pm. i brought them back inside and realized that i had left some items in the car. i went back outside and noticed a very bright light in the wsw above a nearby treeline. i kept looking at it trying to figure out what it might be. i live across the street from a navy helicopter training field, so i am very familiar with their sights and sounds, but it would have been too late for them to be flying anyway. it wasn't a plane- it had no blinking lights and did not move like one. it had fringes of red on the left and right sides and what appeared to be "moonbeams" eminating from it. it moved very slowly towards the south. i called my neighbors (to my west) on the phone and asked them to step outside and see if they witness what i was seeing. we stood in their front yard and watched it move away to the south. we watched it for approximately 10 minutes and they went back inside (since the temperature was around 30 degrees). i came back inside my home and thought about what i was seeing. i went back outside and it was still there, but lower in the sky. i went over to my neighbors (to my east), and they stepped outside into the street and also saw it. we watched it for a few minutes, and they went back inside their home. my neighbor (to the east) went online to see if there were any stars that were supposed to be visible, and i told them i would talk to them later to find out. i went back home at this point.

at about 730pm, i went back outside to see if the light was still in the sky, but it had disappeared. i walked back over to my neighbors (to the east) to see if she had found out anything on the internet, and as i knocked on their door, i turned towards the sws, looking over the helicopter training field towards perdido bay. i saw three orangish-red pulsating orbs. two of them were close together, and the third was further to the west. at this point, i noticed that the orbs were fading out slowly, then would reappear in a different spot. they did this independently of each other. my neighbors came to their door and as we stood in their driveway, we all witnessed the orbs fading out then reappearing, moving westerly. they started appearing closer together. one would fade out, and then the other two would fade out. the whole episode lasted approximately two minutes before the orbs disappeared completely.

we noticed that air traffic in the area picked up considerably during both episodes- more than usual. there was a distinct difference between the bright light and orbs versus the planes and helicpters that started appearing.

my neighbor did say that scorpius would have been the brightest star in the western sky, but when we came out to look for it, it was no longer there- with no explanation where it disappeared. the bright white light was no star. the three pulsating orbs were not stars. i'm not sure what we all saw last night.
content.summary: Two different sightings at different times on same night.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on the 91 east freeway during the early afternoon. i saw what i thought was the local blimp off in the distance hovering. as i got closer, it no longer appeared the be a blimp, but a metallic, cube like object with jagged protrusions. i was attempting to track it and drive. i was able to look at it off and on for about 3 minutes. as i got a bit closer i knew it was not a blimp nor a large suspended balloon. my eyes welded with tears out of disbelief. i also witnesses other people on the freeway looking up to try to see it. eventually i lost track of it due to the direction of the freeway and never caught sight again.
content.summary: Jagged looking hovering ufo.

content.detailedDescription: Me my girlfriend her little sister her mom and the driver which was male were riding around about midnight on gynesynder freeway, when we went over a overpass at stonestreet rd. were there is a very large opening and a few houses around. we came upon a huge round disk shaped object, which was hovering  there in the opeaning with no sound and it was about 2 stories thick with a huge dome on top with tinted windows going around it. it also was above a house but i never went to talk to them cause i dont want to be told to get away. anyway we all seen it and my girlfriends little sister was only 13 or 14 and nobody talks about it, its like it never happend but it did. this is the first time ive told anyone like you'll and its really messed my whole life up. by the way we were right beside the ufo, i didnt notice much but the windows cause i was looking for beings through them but they were to dark andright now i only live a few hundred yards from the sight.
content.summary: Me and 4 other people were driving down freeway and drove beside it.

content.detailedDescription:
On monday  september 12, 2009 these sightings happen between four forty nine pm and four fifty three pm 
 i just got home from work i walked to the end of my house to look at a tree. 
the reason i was looking at my tree,  i had a big limb fell onto my neighbor house a week before.
 i was looking to see how i should cut the tree down without hitting her house .
 then i started to look at my other trees, because they needed trimming too .
i was in by backyard  next  too  my storage building looking up at my trees with my back turn to my house .
 then i started too turn around and look up over my house.
 i don't know why i turn around and look up over my house.
when i turn around and look up i could see a saucer shape craft up over my house hovering.
i could not hear no sound from the craft
.The craft was a dark color  but it look black to me 
the craft looked about 1000 feet  maybe less above my house.
then i start walking toward my house, then the craft started too move slowly, then i reach to my side to
get my camera phone i was trying to set my  camera phone  up to take a picture of the craft then the craft took  off real fast. 
 i could see it moving but it was to far away for me to take a picture.
 then i put my camera phone away then i went back looking at my trees again.
 then i turn around again  it was back over my house  again about the same spot hovering.
 where  i saw it the first time.
then i started walking toward my house then it started moving slowly again it was moving toward  my  other neighbor tree.
  when it got over  the tree it vanish.
 i did not see it leave the second time.
  i could see around  the tree limbs because there was no leaves on the tree, but i did not try to take a picture the second time but after it left the second time.
 i went in the house and got my digital camera but the ufo never  return 
 i was abducted in a church yard in 1997.
  i been having ufo sighting for 12 years know.
 when i have a ufo sighting, it does not scare me are bother me i learn how to live with the sightings
content.summary: I was in my back yard looking at my trees i turned around i could see a disc shape craft hovering over my house about 1000 ft. above my house the craft started to move slowly. i try to take a pic with my camera phone, it took off.

content.detailedDescription:
It was dusk, and myself and a friend walked out into his backyard to go to his garage to retrieve something and from left to right (looking westward) saw a small dull grey or white triangular shaped object follow the chicago and northwestern rr tracks from se to nw. it was in edison park of the nortwest side of chicago, a few miles from o'hare airport.

it was maybe 60 feet off the ground travelling at may 10-12 knots. there was a single light at each tip, and it was silent. my timing was perfect- just as we set foot into the backyard i spotted it jsut entering my line of vision, and watched in amazement as it glided silently away.

it was at dusk, with fading light, and if you weren't looking for it you most likely wouldn't have seen it. my friend and i looked at each other and realized the house full of people we just exited would never believe a couple of 15 year olds...

as time has passed it seems to be important to be noted. i don't know what it was but i know what is wasn't.
content.summary: Saw a triangular shaped object traveling low and slow following power lines on rr tracks.

content.detailedDescription: Looked out at about 7:30 getting dark. i saw one object up treetop level. then i saw another one yellow in color traveling to my right. i let it go then i thought i should look back i then was looking up at a bright star. then from my left a white object moved very fast over the star, it was blinking on and off. it then was gone. this lasted in all about 45 minutes.I did check off and on for several hours. no more activity.I see them all the time. i just want this on record. i am not crazy.
content.summary: I saw three different objects. one yellow close to ground,one in tree, and one going accross very very fast.

content.detailedDescription:
My name is {pid} i am a retired police officer, on the above date my wife and my 15 year old son went to bring my older son back to westfield state college.When they returned home, they were walking from the parking lot to the building where we live, when my 15 year old son observed a huge light in the sky right above the building next to the one we live in.It appeared to be circular for about a minute.He got scared and called my wife to see it and at that moment it appeared liked it got sucked up and became a triangular shape and had no sound it seemed to dissapear up in the sky as fast as turning off a light.When this was occurring my wife called me very excited and asked me to hurry up and go to the porch, i asked her why and she told me just to hurry up and see the light by the other building.By the time i went to the porch it had vanished.When they both came into the house both looked visibly shaken and both of them trying to tell me what happened at the same time.They both showed me how they had goosebumps and couldn't stop talking about it.
in my experience as a police officer when i investigated accidents or crime scenes and talked to witnesses or victims their behavior and demeanor will coraborate their story.I can honestly say that after talking
to both of them they are both convinced to have seen something they had never seen before.


{cms/jat/pid}
content.summary: Huge bright light over building.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i for the last 2 1/2 months have been seeing strange hovering objects in the sky beginning nov. 3rd 2008. the last sighting was last night jan. 21 2009 around 6:45 pm. we were driving west on mckinley ave in fresno ca on our way to a meeting. we noticed 4 hovering objects at a stand still on each side of our car about 3 miles up in the sky, they each had around 4 or more lights on the edges of them while we were at a red light. once our car started moving they moved along side us, every time we stopped they stopped. they all looked alike and did not look like helicopters and not planes. later on in the evening on the way back home we spotted another craft similar to the ones earlier just hovering at a stand still above the houses in our neighborhood. the object even brightened its lights from red to super bright white. it was still for about 3 minutes then slowly started to move to the right, then left then it either vanished or we just did not catch it take off. this is not the first time we have seen these objects in the sky. we seen larger ones the size of two commercial planes before. we just find it strange that the sightings have not stopped. our children, my parents friends and my mother in law have all witnessed them. for some strange reason these objects have not gone away and seem to be growing by the numbers each day and showing themselves pretty boldly. if anyone has seen them also please post a report, we hope we are not just going crazy over here by ourselves.
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Followed by ufos?

content.detailedDescription: 1967 at night, i was plowing a field preparing it for rice planting. just me in a field totally dark, the field was approx. 75 acres. i saw a ring of lights white and red maybe 400 yards above slowly descending to the ground.I was driving a tractor and pulling a plow. i stopped the tractor and watched as the craft lowered and landed several hundred yards from me. it set for a time so i headed my tractor in its direction to see what it was. as i got closer i was able to get a better view. it had a triangular bubble top that was lit up. the bubble set atop a dark circular base with red and white lights circling the bottom. the whole thing looked about 30 to 40 feet in diameter. as i got closer there appeared very large visions of black leopard type cats, hissing and making growling screaming kind of noises, surounding the tractor. i stopped the tractor and thought about running, when suddenly the cats dissapeared. i felt something at my right side and looked, it was a small individual. on tractors of that size there are small seats on each of the drivers seat. we were both sitting but i estimate him to be 3 to 4 feet tall. he was wearing a grey suit with blue seams. the suit was not like latex but more like what we now have called bubble wrap. his skin was the color of a caucasion that had not seen the sun for quite some time. he was wearing grey gloves and high top grey fabric shoes.He had a helmut but that was taken off quickly. i dont know but i really wasnt that frightened actually kind of relaxed. he was talking and i couldnt understand anything, he produced a platinum object about 7 or 8 inches long and had the width and depth of a domino. etched on it about 1/4 inch apart were symbols and what looked like letters. he handed me the object and i could understand everey word he said. i dont know if i was speaking his language or mine but we were communicating. he told me that the huge cats were used often to approach subjects while they were confused. of course they were not real but the visions were. i have heard of many ufo sightings and encounters over the years, but never have i heard of any visions of animals. yet he told me that this trick was used often. he told me that a log was kept on everyone that had ever been visited including animals. he told me that he was only one of a hundred ships that were sent out by the mother ship, which he pointed out to me. during day time the mother ship was hidden in clouds and at night it was high enough in the sky to avoid detection. he pointed to red lights that were appearing and disappearing in the sky an said those were ships like his leaving and returning. he would not let me get close to his ship but he showed me several things. like a flash light that could go around an object and continue its beam on the objects other side like the object wasnt there. i was with him for 6 to 7 hours because when he left dawn was just breaking. he told me that all visitants would be visited again from time to time, including me, and i have been several times. all i know is that i have never been able to father a child. my teeth have thousands of small pin holes at the gum line which causes me to have them redone every 2 or 3 years. a military dentist asked me if i had ever undergone high doses of radiation or had special tests performed by the military. it has been many years and i have told no body eccept my wife. if you have interest please e mail me. i have alot more to tell.
content.summary: Saw craft land, spoke with individual duration 6 or 7 hrs.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 830 pm, my friend colin, his girlfriend marnie, and i(julian) were driving down i-25 south of fillmore. i was the 1st to notice this light in the sky it was larger than any airliner or object i have ever seen. i saw i and immediatly pointed it out to colin and marnie. i was facing south towards cheyenne mountain. i saw the lights, there were three lights about a thousand feet(it seemed it was halfway up cheyenne mountain), all in a line the light simaltamiusly shut off. this happened two more times, with the last sighting seeming that the object was moving, the lights appeared in a trangular shape almost seeming like they were separated or it was turning. we even drove all the way to the base of the mountain, the frontage road to n.O.R.A.D. i have never seen anything like it before, and i noticed there was no air traffic in the air at the time, as soon as this object dissappeared i noticed air traffic resumed.
content.summary: I look in the sky, i saw a brite lite. this light split into 3 separate objects, all 3 had lights on them.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on i-25 passing the fillmore exit when my friend julian noticed some lights in the sky next to norad and pointed them out to my girlfriend and i. the lights went out almost as soon as we looked, but by that point we were curious and kept our attention directed towards the mountain. we also noticed that there were no commercial planes flying in that area, nothing in the air at that time. about 40 to 45 seconds later, the lights came back on, all simultaneously, and in a horizontal row. there were three lights, to the left of the mountain and about 3/4ths of the height of the mountain. they stayed perfectly still, and went off a few seconds later, all simultaneous. we have lived in colorado springs all of our lives, and there are three air bases here and a major airport, and we have never seen anything this big, especially with no visible faa lights, so we knew we were seeing something odd. i have also witnessed the military base dropping and firing flares, but these were much brighter, did not have the distinctive smoke trail, and stayed stationary in perfect unison. we kept driving south on the highway to see if we'd see it again, and just as we'd hoped the lights went on again. we were extremely excited, and i called my father who was on the east side of town to go outside and look, though he saw nothing. at this time, the lights were the same place and height in the sky, but it looked as if the craft had shifted or if we were getting closer because one of the lights was slightly lower than the other two lights. they were in the same place in the sky, just slightly angled, like points of a triangle. the lights stayed on for approx. one second and then went out. we continued driving south to see if we could see it again, even going so far as driving to about 100 yards away from the access road to norad, yet we never saw anything. we did notice though that aircraft flight continued around and above the mountain after that. we continued home in hopes of seeing something on the local news, yet saw nothing even mentioned.
content.summary: Row of lights in the sky turning on and off next to cheyenne mountain and norad.

content.detailedDescription:
I let my dog out into our back garden at eleven-o-clock and at about five past she had not come back in so i went to look where she was and she was still at the top of the garden, so as she did not seem ready to come in at that time, being a keen astronomer i decided to a bit of sky gazing.
it was quite frosty with a mainly clear sky and just a few small clouds.
after looking for about 5 minutes, i noticed to my left due west, a orange
object which appeared to be glowing,my first thoughts were, that being close to the aircraft routes to manchester airport that this may be an aircraft on fire, but as it started to move across my horizon left to right,  west to east it was getting bigger and taking the shape of a glowing orb.I have never in all my years of watching the skies seen anything like it,in the excitement of seeing the object, i called my wife to come and see it and she could not believe it either.
as the orb passed in front of us at an angle of about 45 degrees it was seen to glow from orange in the centre to red on the outer fringes,the outer edges not seeming to be very sharply outlined but appearing slightly gaseous.It passed behind a small cloud and was still visible through the cloud and as it passed further to our right eastwards it still kept its shape and form.When it was at its highest above us it was about the size of my little finger nail, when held at arms length.
the transaction of this object took about 5 minutes from west to east. 
there did not seem to be any variation in the objects trajectory up or down it was passing at a steady constant speed until out of site.
when telling m y sister the next day she said that herself and husband had seen three of these objects on 1/1/09 at 1am travelling east to west over there house in another part of our town and also other people in the staffordshire moorlands saw them on the new years eve.
i contacted bbc radio stoke two days after and reported the sighting but they have not got back to me.

hoping this is of interest to you
   yours sincerely
content.summary: Orange orb.

content.detailedDescription:
The incident occurred as i was driving one evening on a small street that intersects with street road in bensalem, pa.  as i approached the busy street road intersection, i was astonished to see two silent triangle-shaped objects hovering in the sky near philly race park. one was closer and more visible, the second further in the distance.  the objects were dark but their outline was clearly discernable - they weren't helicopters, stars, planes, or blimps.  i could not account for what these objects were - they were just hovering. the objects resembled the triangles of the belgium wave in the 80's (yes - i admittedly have a passing interest, and i'm familiar with the major incidents but wouldn't call myself a "true believer".) however, i was also amazed that none of the other traffic going east on street road was reacting to this.  (thinking back, it was probably because the objects were large and further than they appeared as you approached the intersection and could not see them if you were traveling actually on street road. it was difficult to tell, since there was no reference point, the objects proximity and size - if they were smaller and closer or larger and further away.) because of this, and because i have an interest in this phenomenon, i convinced myself this was a trick of the light, my imagination - or something.  i kept driving, but never entirely wrote the incident off, and can't say i fully convinced myself that this was an optical illusion or something i misidentified.  it stayed with me. 

now, i'm reading that there are several incidents in bucks county around this same time and felt compelled to report this incident.  i can not claim that i saw ufos before, other than this incident.  i don't know what these hovering triangles were or if it is explainable but i simply can't account for them.  the time and dates are approximate - guesses, to be honest, at this point.

please respect my wishes to remain anonymous.
content.summary: I was driving home from work and saw two hovering triangles near the philly race park on street road.

content.detailedDescription: It was around 7:30pm on jan. 21st 2009 when i looked out of my 3rd story apartment building window, and saw the usual airplane.Since we live about 15 minutes from one,i see them quite often,however, below the airplane apeared to be another blinking craft of some sort.It didn't look like itwas moving,because the airplane that was much higher,went out of my view.I watched it for about a minute,because i thought that it was odd to not be moving,yet have blinking lights.As i watched it, it sped up toward my direction, going west.It had looked like it made a 45 degree angle turn all of a sudden in my direction.I became very nervous,and almost panicked as i watched it move slowly about 100 yrds from my window.I saw what looked like a triangular shaped craft with black on top/sides of it.I saw the whole bottom as it went over my apartment building.It had 3 lights,one on each point and the bottom seemed to be dark but almost cloudy-like.I immediately was scared and called my mom to calm me down.My husband who normally would be home at that time,was in a meeting.When he returned home we both saw several blinking lights,but could not make out if it was a triangular shape craft or helicopters.I know what i saw,and it needs to be known that these crafts are out there.What they are, i do not know.
content.summary: Very dark in color, had 3 lights in which one or more would blink, triangular shaped. the size of a large bus maybe.

content.detailedDescription: I walked out to start my vehicle to warm up and i noticed a circle object in the northwest sky displaying multi colors at the time it was stationary and after a few minutes it traveled from the northwest to south east very fast and doing very sharp turns unlike any aircraft i ever seen and the way it traveled to the sky i dont think any aircraft can by man can achieve this movement , also there was no sound at all from the circle. the object was stationary in the southeast sky close to the wyoming army national guard training base south range area. the object then shot across the sky rite over the town of guernsey and was now in the west it remained there for a few min. and then it shot toward the northeast near the town of hartville and it was out of low on the horizon my sight due to the foothils. my feelings were i never seen anything like this before and i noticed a driver of a semi truck was stopped on our street observing the object.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Pulsating multi color lights object displaying strange movements.

content.detailedDescription: This evening at 7:40 pm (jan. 21, 2009) i stepped out onto my deck for my night vigil of sky watch and observed a large-bright slow moving white light slowly moving north-easterly from the south-west.  the wife stepped out seconds after i first noticed the light and soon we were both watching as it slowly approached our area.  i estimate the light to have been at least 8 to 10,000 ft. as judged by local air traffic in and out of nashville. a departing airliner passed over our house and was headed west in the vicinity of the object (light). the object slowly began to fade it���s light as the airliner approached till it completely faded out. the airliner flew past the area but the object never reappeared. i am seeing these anomalous night lights with frequent observations this month. a consistent observation i have made is that these lighted objects will fade with approaching aircraft and will suddenly appear when there is no air traffic in the vicinity.
content.summary: Large bright slow moving lighted object.

content.detailedDescription:
Nov. 5th 2008

it was the night of nov. 5th 2008 in los angeles ca, 90046 area code (hollywood).  the day after the elections there were mixed feelings in l.A. because of the prop. 8 results (gay/lesbian marriage ban passed).  there was a demonstration of gays & lesbians on sunset blvd. around 9pm that night.  they march down the  street started quite a ways down in west hollywood at sunset and la cienega blvd and were moving east towards my neighborhood.

before they ever got close, however, i was standing on my balcony and noticed three helicopters  hovering in place directly north of me (nowhere near the protest march)
they seemed to be triangulated on a fixed point in the sky over the hollywood hills.   
i started to focus on the fixed point they were all surrounding and saw a bright white ball of light in the center of the three chopper triangle formation.

the light looked smaller in comparison to the choppers, but very bright.  this ball of light then moved up and down vertically very quickly a few times and then took off very fast toward the east  in an erratic way that left a momentary squiggly trail of light.  then it was gone.  

the whole event probably lasted no more than 1 or 2 minutes.   the helicopters dispersed 5 to 10 minutes afterword and the protest march didn't make it to my neighborhood for another 30 - 40 minutes after that.   didn't see any news coverage of the march from an overhead vantage point.   due to the distance between myself and the 3 helicopters and the darkness, i was unable to see any markings identifying them as lapd, news or otherwise.

my balcony has a western exposure with a 180 〬 degree view from north to south on the 4th floor which overlooks much of hollywood.

thats about it.
content.summary: White ball of light surrounded by 3 helicopters over the hollywood hills near sunset & la brea.

content.detailedDescription: Flew over my appartment bright disk shape light like a spotlight but no sound and vibration of the light like a helecopter. just one solid light moving faster than a plane or a jet. i counted it out to about 8 seconds i never left my eye's off it my daughter and my wife seen it with there own eye's. by the time i have counted up to 8 sec. it looked like a star and hovered i pulled out my daughters telescope it's a meade high powered telescope i couldn't have a lock on the object it was moving to fast and it vanished.
content.summary: Star like brighter than venus with no shimmer like a plane or a chopper.

content.detailedDescription:
My fianc��� and i were driving home from work, around 10:55 pm central time (nashville, tn- antioch to be exact), when he tapped me and pointed to an object in the sky.  at first, he thought it was a helicopter or a plane, as we are very close to the airport.  as we approached our stoplight (the corner of murfreesboro road and nashboro blvd.) we noticed how large and how bright the object actually was.  it was obvious from how low it was in the sky and the area where it was that this was no helicopter.

we turned down our road, nashboro blvd, and the object seemed to almost hover in the sky, making a descent behind a massive abandoned house, and landing in what we guessed was an open field.  it was fairly close above us and it appeared much larger than a plane.  it was flat bottomed, noiseless, and, like previously stated, seemed to almost hover like a flying car might.  the lights were so bright, even from a distance, that it gave the impression of halogens.

after this, we drove around the area (down smith springs road, bell road, etc..) seeing if we could get a better view of the field.  it was very obstructed so we could not get a view from our car.  as we were driving down smith springs, however, my fianc��� noticed an object shoot up, at a strange angle, and seem to bolt across the sky.  i did not notice it until he pointed it out, very far from the field, where we assumed it had just been.  though we had not seen the field, the area seemed to be artificially illuminated by some outside light source.

for about 30-40 minutes we drove around, making u-turns and trying our best to follow the object when we could find it in our view.  we lost it a few times, but we seemed to always find it, hovering around the same general area.  to me, watching it hover, it almost looked like a search craft, like a craft looking for something.

on our final drive down nashboro blvd, it was the closest we had seen it.  the sensation was that of the craft moving towards us, descending so low as if it might just graze the car.  once again, we noticed a hovering, a searching, yet no sound.  it passed over the area, once again, and headed in the direction of the field.  my fianc���, with his head out of the car door, snapped a few pictures, as it passed by.

the actions of the object can only be described as smooth, fluid, and fast
content.summary: Craft seen hovering low over populated country area.

content.detailedDescription:
About 8:27pm tonight, 1/21/09, me and my friend were at the pueblo city park behind the baseball field and skate park, parked in a car overlooking the river as it goes under pueblo blvd. on google maps, we were parked at coordinates 38.266590, -104.657360. it was somewhat windy, clear skies and able to see the stars. looking in the direction of google map coordinates 38.273312, -104.667145, on the other side of pueblo blvd and on the other side of the river from where we were, we saw an orange light maybe 6-7 stories high. it was an orange sperical light that flashed on and off once. then a few seconds later it turned on again, then seperated into three seperate orange spheres, extending away from us and to our left looking out toward pmi. the lights then stayed on for about 1 second, fully extended and remaining absolutely still and perfectly aligned to each other despite the wind. then about 45 seconds later the three seperate orange sphere lights turned on, in the same direction and area as before, but one was closer to the ground and the other two were splayed out away from the other about 8 stories high, but each flashed on simultaneously and off simultaneously, all in a duration of 1 second. then a few minutes later regular aircraft with required faa lights flew over and kept flying over. the ufos were not seen again afterward, and we only saw them at a time when it seemed no air traffic was in the immediate area.

we had parked there because we had seen ufos there before and figured we might see on tonight. we noticed what seemed to be a bright, large planet out to the west. that planet had been in the exact same spot the night before, but tonight it began to slightly move around in every different direction, not staying stationary, and then it moved farther and faster from where it should have been in the sky. that's what got us to look in that general direction, and then we saw the first flash of the single orange sphere way to the right and close to the ground on the other side of the river. after the orange speheres, we looked back at what should have been a planet and it remained stationary and eventually sat below the horizon with the rest of the stars about 15 minutes after the orange spheres had stopped activity.

my friend who was driving and wants to remain anonymous called his friend who was in pueblo west on his cell phone after the second appearance of the lights and during the third appearance said that his cell phone recepetion cut out slightly during the call, especially during the third appearance of the lights, and after the lights stopped appearing the reception was back to normal. he said the person in pueblo west he was talking to also saw the lights simultaneously.
content.summary: 3 orange lights west of pueblo blvd. and arkansas river.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw the prior report regarding the same event on this the tracker. i decided to do a little research on cnn's sight and found the video the prior person was referencing. i don't know what it is. it could be a bird, or it could be a high speed craft of some sort. i think it does merit further analysis.

the link can be found below. sorry you'll have to sit through a commercial. the object enters from the right about 8 seconds into the video and travels across the entire screen. i would love to know if this is authentic or if it is a bird. 

http://www.Cnn.Com/video/#/video/politics/2009/01/20/inaug.Blitz.Gergen.Obrien.Cnn?Iref=videosearch
content.summary: Ufo in obama inauguration video.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside and looked out immediately at this bright huge light. it was low, like where the commercial planes fly. maybe abit higher. i ran to get my mom and tell her to look at it. it was so bright and big it was like the size of 5 north stars but it looked like ahuge beam of light. for a moment a green meteor type tail of light was coming off of it. looked about an inch long. so i thought maybe i was staring to hard at it and looked away and it still had that beam very thin light coming off it from the top. i watched from time to time about every 15 mins. after about 45 mins it looked like it had gotten dimmer. i was waiting to put my daughter to bed and showed her it and when i looked at it again it had gotten even dimmer. i don't know why i didn't jump in the car to begin with but i did finally. i went out of the neighborhood in the direction it was going and looked to the right. i was alone and driving so no no one else was with me to see that just about 30 seconds down the road this thing was just sitting there and didn't move, just sat there. what i saw were the lights going around it on its sides not facing me the lights were facing to the sides in red and i think green and white. but this wasnt a plane. i saw it, it was huge and just sitting there as if it wanted to just sit. very weird. it was getting dimmer and the brighter area of white now orange shaded in color was at the top and bottom of it in a circle shape (the lights). i tried to get a better view and drove up and turned around about 1-2 minutes later. it was gone. i turned down the rode called my mom told her to look out the window and see if she could see it and i said it was gone and she said she didn't see it. i wouldn't normally report something like this but i want to know what it was and if anyone else had seen it. i wouldn't believe it if no one else reported it to the police. my mom and i aren't the type to call or report these things but even she said call the police department and see if they kknow anything. so i know she was abit nervous and she and i both know that for that length of time no way was it a plane or helicopter. we did see planes and helicopter around its proximity and they were nowhere near the size nor color. please contact me and let me know if any1 has seen this or if infact you have an answer of what it was. thank you
content.summary: Round like a ball-lights went around sides red and green not quite all the way round.

content.detailedDescription: At aprox. 930 pm, as i was driving home from work, i made a left turn on cathcart road in blue bell pa.  i immediately noticed a flashing red light directly ahead of me.  the light seemed to be the size of a dime on the horizion which is much much larger than any other light i've ever seen in the sky.  at first i thought it looked unusual but believed i would recognize a familiar shape when i got closer.  the closer i got i realized the one large blinking red light was actually two lights.  i made a right turn on morris road at which point the object began to move parallel to me.  i was amazed at how large these lights were and the absence of any other light sources other than the two extremely large red flashes.  at this point i couldn't believe what i was seeing.  it passed within a few hundred  yards of me.  it appeared to be shuffling across the sky.  moving forward, then slightly backward, then forward ect. it moved towards lansdale and over the horizion, still clearly visible the whole time.  it did not make a sound but passed right overhead. i do  not know what this object was, but i can say that i am positive that it was not an airplane, helicopter, blimp or anything else that i have ever seen before.  i really hope someone else saw this because it was the strangest thing i've ever encountered
content.shape: Circle,  Fireball,  Flash,  Oval,  Square,  Rectagular
content.summary: Saw two pulsating red lights blinking in sequence much larger than aircraft.

content.detailedDescription:
at approx 11:30 pm, late summer or early fall of 2008, i was looking out the kitchen window waiting for my wife to return from work, at which time i noticed something very unusual, in the sky.  it was a display of red lights, in an irregular rectangular arrangement with no noticable solid form or mass.  there was no aircraft attached to it.  it hoovered for a while and also moved very slowly.  i went outside to get a better look and then it moved to the back of my house and disappeared.

     shortly after, my wife returned from work and asked me what was wrong, as i appeared, to her, to be distressed.  i told her, "i just saw the wierdest thing", and proceded to tell her my observations.  at her urging, i called the local police department to report what i had seen.  i also asked them if anyone else had called tonight with a similar observation.  they replied, "no."

      i recently watched a tv documentary regarding ufo's sighted in the bucks county area (which is where i live).  this gave some credability to my story.  today, the trend newspaper, front page article features a story on        bucks ufo sightings, which further validates my experience.
content.summary: Ufo sited in the sky, outside my home for approx 10 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: Hovering kind of low with bright light [spectrum] spinning in a very fast circular motion then slowed down and the light dimmed.  i was watching tv and my brother noticed it and called me outside and i saw this object spinning very fast in the sky and it was a very bright light and nothing that ive ever seen before. when i first noticed i could tell it was a ufo because it did not have characteristic and an airplane of helicopter. when i first saw it  i was alarmed because i have never seen a ufo before so i was just amazed and astonished at what i was seeing. i lost sight of the object as it slow came to a stop of spinning and the light dimmed and then some trees blocked my view soi went back inside.
content.summary: Hovering kind of low with bright light [spectrum]

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home - my neighborhood is really dark at night - and i saw these lights standing still in the sky.  they were never there before and i was wondering if it was a tower of some sort because they were perfectly still.  i drove closer to see if they were in fact motionless to make sure it wasn't a plane, and sure enough the lights didn't move.  i stopped to gaze at it and the lights became more detailed and began to move towards my car, at that moment i turned off my lights out of fear.  after a couple of seconds i turned my lights back on and started to drive at a speed of about 25-30 m.P.H.  the lights flew right above me still heading towards me, but as a car approached the back of my vehicle, the lights started to turn and flew in the direction i was going rather than towards me almost as if they were backing off.  as it flew over my car, i was staring at it and could make out the faint outline of the body of the craft and it looked as if it was an airplane but not quite put together the same way.  i was more anxious and in complete disbelief that this was happening to me, i just really wanted to find out what his was.  i first thought it was a helicopter because of how slow it was moving but the positioning of the lights threw that idea out the window.  all of this happened in an instance, the thoughts running through my head, and as the craft turned it started to pick up speed and flew into the night.  the thing that made me believe that what i was seeing was unidentified, not of alien nature, was the speed of the craft.  the lights were motionless and then started moving towards me and then flew over head, very low i must add, too low for the planes normally flying around my neighborhood.  i tried to take a video from my car but couldn't make out the lights from my phone's camera.  one last thing, the lights had an amber glow to them, and i could hear no engine of any kind.  really freaky!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw two lights, thought they were a tower, went to check on it, started moving.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my kitchen after work getting some food and i noticed this really bright orange sphere in the sky ..I gave it a second look and since i was looking through a window i thought there may have been some sort of reflection..So i went out side and now there were 2 bright orange speheres in the sky..I wtched them for about 30 seconds and they just disapeared...So i went back inside and grabbed my camera hoping it may happen again..And dure  enough it did..So i video taped the speheres comming and going...There were as many as 4 speheres at 1 point and they seemed to be forming triangles and rectangles in the sky and then they would disapear..And then anothere one would light back up....I live in oceanside and camp pendelton marine base is just n miles north of my home wich is exactly where i saw the sphere hovering.....I called the military base and couldnt get any info....

i have over 7 minutes of video of these bright orange spheres that looked like fireballs appearing and disapearing....I googled this and found a few other people have mentioned seeing the same thing in the same area .......But at different times than me.

i really would like to know if anyone else has reported this ....All this is happeneing right around camp pendelton marine base......And this looks like absolutely no other light i have ever seen.... tried to rationalize and thought they may be high powered flares but they moved in an organized formation and held there position longer than a flare...I eveb have other planes that fly  by while im fimimng and you can see that the spheres are nothing like the planes.....When i zoomed all the way in with my camera the spheres appeared to be pulsating or flashing at a high rate i looked very similar to fire....

i have vidoe of this and would be happy to share it if anyone is interested...Please contact me and let me know if anyone else saw this and may know what it is?
content.summary: Bright orange balls of light appearing and disapearing and forming various formations in the sky.
